code.text: Patients with confirmed COVID-19 in any location.

population.description:
Active encounters where the encounter diagnosis is suspected or confirmed COVID-19,
or a Condition of confirmed COVID-19 was created during that encounter.  This includes the patients with laboratory-confirmed
or clinically diagnosed COVID-19.

criteria.name: ConfirmedC19Pats
criteria.description:
This expression finds encounters that were active or finished in the reporting period, and their referenced Patient, Condition
and Observation resources. It filters these based on cases where Encounter reports a reason or condition in the
ConfirmedCOVID19Diagnoses value set, or where a positive lab test from the Covid19Labs valueset, or where the patient
has any such associated Condition or Observation resources in the prior two weeks.

criteria.expression:
findAll('Condition',
	for('patient', $this.subject),
	with('code').in(%AllCOVID19RiskFactors.url)
       with('date').greaterThan(%ReportingPeriod.start - 1 'year')
   ).onServers(%Base).select(
   	iif(code, memberOf(%NeoplasticCOVID19RiskFactors.url), 'Neoplastic Disease', {}) |
   	iif(code, memberOf(%COPDCOVID19RiskFactors.url), 'COPD', {}) |
   	iif(code, memberOf(%TobaccoCOVID19RiskFactors.url), 'Tobacco User', {}) |
   	iif(code, memberOf(%HypertensionCOVID19RiskFactors.url), 'Hypertension', {}) |	// Calling out Hypertension separately for reasons
   	iif(code, memberOf(%CardiovascularCOVID19RiskFactors.url), 'Cardiovascular Disease', {}) |	// Even though it isa Cardiovascular disease
   	iif(code, memberOf(%ObesityCOVID19RiskFactors.url), 'Obesity', {}) |
   	iif(code, memberOf(%SickleCellCOVID19RiskFactors.url), 'Sickle cell Disease', {}) |
   	iif(code, memberOf(%KidneyDiseaseCOVID19RiskFactors.url), 'Chronic Kidney Disease', {}) |
   	iif(code, memberOf(%PregnancyCOVID19RiskFactors.url), 'Pregnant', {}) |
   	iif(code, memberOf(%DiabetesCOVID19RiskFactors.url), 'Diabetes', {})
   )
